item.title: Hello world!
item.dc:creator: info@itkeepers.com
item.content:encoded: Welcome to WordPress. This is your first post. Edit or delete it, then start writing!

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: Hi, this is a comment. To get started with moderating, editing, and deleting comments, please visit the Comments screen in the dashboard. Commenter avatars come from Gravatar.

item.title: Sample Page
item.dc:creator: info@itkeepers.com
item.content:encoded:
This is an example page. It's different from a blog post because it will stay in one place and will show up in your site navigation (in most themes). Most people start with an About page that introduces them to potential site visitors. It might say something like this:

Hi there! I'm a bike messenger by day, aspiring actor by night, and this is my website. I live in Los Angeles, have a great dog named Jack, and I like piña coladas. (And gettin' caught in the rain.)

...or something like this:

The XYZ Doohickey Company was founded in 1971, and has been providing quality doohickeys to the public ever since. Located in Gotham City, XYZ employs over 2,000 people and does all kinds of awesome things for the Gotham community.

As a new WordPress user, you should go to your dashboard to delete this page and create new pages for your content. Have fun!

item.title: Privacy Policy
item.dc:creator: info@itkeepers.com
item.content:encoded:
Who we are

Suggested text: Our website address is: https://b2dshop.com/rony.

Comments

Suggested text: When visitors leave comments on the site we collect the data shown in the comments form, and also the visitor’s IP address and browser user agent string to help spam detection.

An anonymized string created from your email address (also called a hash) may be provided to the Gravatar service to see if you are using it. The Gravatar service privacy policy is available here: https://automattic.com/privacy/. After approval of your comment, your profile picture is visible to the public in the context of your comment.

Media

Suggested text: If you upload images to the website, you should avoid uploading images with embedded location data (EXIF GPS) included. Visitors to the website can download and extract any location data from images on the website.

Cookies

Suggested text: If you leave a comment on our site you may opt-in to saving your name, email address and website in cookies. These are for your convenience so that you do not have to fill in your details again when you leave another comment. These cookies will last for one year.

If you visit our login page, we will set a temporary cookie to determine if your browser accepts cookies. This cookie contains no personal data and is discarded when you close your browser.

When you log in, we will also set up several cookies to save your login information and your screen display choices. Login cookies last for two days, and screen options cookies last for a year. If you select "Remember Me", your login will persist for two weeks. If you log out of your account, the login cookies will be removed.

If you edit or publish an article, an additional cookie will be saved in your browser. This cookie includes no personal data and simply indicates the post ID of the article you just edited. It expires after 1 day.

Embedded content from other websites

Suggested text: Articles on this site may include embedded content (e.g. videos, images, articles, etc.). Embedded content from other websites behaves in the exact same way as if the visitor has visited the other website.

These websites may collect data about you, use cookies, embed additional third-party tracking, and monitor your interaction with that embedded content, including tracking your interaction with the embedded content if you have an account and are logged in to that website.

Who we share your data with

Suggested text: If you request a password reset, your IP address will be included in the reset email.

How long we retain your data

Suggested text: If you leave a comment, the comment and its metadata are retained indefinitely. This is so we can recognize and approve any follow-up comments automatically instead of holding them in a moderation queue.

For users that register on our website (if any), we also store the personal information they provide in their user profile. All users can see, edit, or delete their personal information at any time (except they cannot change their username). Website administrators can also see and edit that information.

What rights you have over your data

Suggested text: If you have an account on this site, or have left comments, you can request to receive an exported file of the personal data we hold about you, including any data you have provided to us. You can also request that we erase any personal data we hold about you. This does not include any data we are obliged to keep for administrative, legal, or security purposes.

Where your data is sent

Suggested text: Visitor comments may be checked through an automated spam detection service.

item.title: Landing Page 02
item.dc:creator: info@itkeepers.com
item.content:encoded:
A leading provider of IT services in Florida.

We can offer you assistance whether you are an individual, small business owner, mid-level service provider, or enterprise. We want to help you ensure that your business stays up to date with the latest technologies and has any issues taken care of promptly. These are some great reasons to come to us if you need to hire someone for any aspect of IT. Contact Now

Request a quote

Why Choose Us

We won’t obligate you to hire us for the project or tell you anything that interferes with achieving your goals. That’s why our customers love us, and you will feel the same after speaking to one of our people. Friendliness and kindness are two important elements to ensure that all parts of your IT projects go smoothly. Our customers are never an inconvenience. As such, we’re always eager and willing to respond to their service requests. Call Now

About Us

One of our greatest attributes is that we stay available to our clients 24 hours a day and seven days a week. Thus, we’ll never burden you by telling you only to contact us during certain hours. Our agents are available to speak to you about your IT needs when you have early-bird brainstorms, daytime questions, and nighttime epiphanies.

We want to help, and we understand that issues and concerns can arise at any time.

Call Now

Expertise

Unlocking Technological Evolution for Your Business

In today's rapidly evolving digital landscape, technology stands ready to transform your business. Embrace this evolution by connecting with us for expert assistance in fostering the growth and seamless implementation of your IT systems. We offer various convenient methods for you to get in touch with us, ensuring a smoother journey toward technological excellence. Call Now

Services

Managed IT

IT Keepers specializes in providing managed IT in the state of Florida. Managed IT will allow you to have a dedicated team of professionals working on your computers and networks at all times. These professionals will prioritize your business and what it needs to succeed with online or computer technology. These are a few ways you can benefit from requesting our managed IT service.

Cloud Services

IT Keeper provides cloud services to people and businesses that need them. We are a well-trusted IT company in Florida, and cloud service is something many of our clients use and desire. We also offer managed cloud services to give business owners time to breathe as much as possible. If you’re still on the fence about whether to obtain cloud services, these are a few reasons why it’s an excellent idea to do so.

Security Solutions

IT Keeper can assist you with security solutions for your home computer, business network, or infrastructure. Our Florida technicians stay informed and educated about recent developments in computer technology and can ensure that your machines have the highest level of protection. Here’s why it’s wise to contact us for help with security system installation and implementation.

Email Management

IT Keeper offers email management services to personal and business clients in various areas of Florida. Email is still one of the most vastly used methods of communication between businesses and their clients, business partners, prospects, and the like. So it’s understandable to seek email solutions or email management services from a trusted provider. We are the company many people come to when they need help that relates to any aspect of IT.

Computer Networking

IT Keeper is a computer networking provider in Florida that can help you build and maintain a network. We helped business owners in various industries get their IT network off the ground with our services. We want to offer you the same opportunity to relax while our technicians build your network. Maybe you already have a network, but you need to upgrade your equipment or software. Those tasks are part of the advanced skill set we have.

Server Management

IT Keeper offers server management to business entities and enterprises in Florida. We know how important your services are to your success. Therefore, we have a team of experts who will be delighted to manage your servers when you don’t have the headcount or the funding to hire additional workers. Our services are fairly priced, and we have many positive reviews and examples of the benefits our former clients have experienced from using our services.

Mission & Passion

A Decade Of Experience

We don’t just talk the talk. We have also walked the walk. Our professionals are well-trained, educated, and certified to perform IT-related services for anyone who needs them. We have been in the industry for 10 years and are confident that we’ll be around another 10 years after today.

Satisfaction Guaranteed

Our company offers a 100 percent guarantee. That means you can let us know if you are not happy with our services, and we will make an arrangement with you that may include refunding your expenses or revising the project. Every positive comment we receive from our clients confirms how well we perform and how flexible we are.

Dedicated Consultations

We operate as consultants along with our other services. Thus, you can reach out to us if you need a friendly and helpful person to assist you in choosing service options. Make a quick phone call to contact us & describe what you have on your list of goals. Our consultant will then perform an analysis & let you know if your plan seems feasible.

Testimonials

"We have been extremely satisfied with the services provided by ITKeepers. They have helped us to streamline our IT operations, reduce costs, and improve the reliability and security of our systems. The staff are knowledgeable and responsive, and have gone above and beyond to help us meet our business goals. We highly recommend ITKeepers to any organization looking for top-notch IT support and consulting services."

Danny Karam

The staff are knowledgeable and responsive, and have gone above and beyond to help us meet our business goals. item.title: Landing page 03
item.dc:creator: info@itkeepers.com
item.content:encoded:
A leading provider of IT services in Florida.

We can offer you assistance whether you are an individual, small business owner, mid-level service provider, or enterprise. We want to help you ensure that your business stays up to date with the latest technologies and has any issues taken care of promptly. These are some great reasons to come to us if you need to hire someone for any aspect of IT. Contact Now

Request a quote

Why Choose Us

We won’t obligate you to hire us for the project or tell you anything that interferes with achieving your goals. That’s why our customers love us, and you will feel the same after speaking to one of our people. Friendliness and kindness are two important elements to ensure that all parts of your IT projects go smoothly. Our customers are never an inconvenience. As such, we’re always eager and willing to respond to their service requests. Call Now

About Us

One of our greatest attributes is that we stay available to our clients 24 hours a day and seven days a week. Thus, we’ll never burden you by telling you only to contact us during certain hours. Our agents are available to speak to you about your IT needs when you have early-bird brainstorms, daytime questions, and nighttime epiphanies.

We want to help, and we understand that issues and concerns can arise at any time.

Call Now

Expertise

Unlocking Technological Evolution for Your Business

In today's rapidly evolving digital landscape, technology stands ready to transform your business. Embrace this evolution by connecting with us for expert assistance in fostering the growth and seamless implementation of your IT systems. We offer various convenient methods for you to get in touch with us, ensuring a smoother journey toward technological excellence. Call Now

Services

Managed IT

IT Keepers specializes in providing managed IT in the state of Florida. Managed IT will allow you to have a dedicated team of professionals working on your computers and networks at all times. These professionals will prioritize your business and what it needs to succeed with online or computer technology. These are a few ways you can benefit from requesting our managed IT service.

Cloud Services

IT Keeper provides cloud services to people and businesses that need them. We are a well-trusted IT company in Florida, and cloud service is something many of our clients use and desire. We also offer managed cloud services to give business owners time to breathe as much as possible. If you’re still on the fence about whether to obtain cloud services, these are a few reasons why it’s an excellent idea to do so.

Security Solutions

IT Keeper can assist you with security solutions for your home computer, business network, or infrastructure. Our Florida technicians stay informed and educated about recent developments in computer technology and can ensure that your machines have the highest level of protection. Here’s why it’s wise to contact us for help with security system installation and implementation.

Email Management

IT Keeper offers email management services to personal and business clients in various areas of Florida. Email is still one of the most vastly used methods of communication between businesses and their clients, business partners, prospects, and the like. So it’s understandable to seek email solutions or email management services from a trusted provider. We are the company many people come to when they need help that relates to any aspect of IT.

Computer Networking

IT Keeper is a computer networking provider in Florida that can help you build and maintain a network. We helped business owners in various industries get their IT network off the ground with our services. We want to offer you the same opportunity to relax while our technicians build your network. Maybe you already have a network, but you need to upgrade your equipment or software. Those tasks are part of the advanced skill set we have.

Server Management

IT Keeper offers server management to business entities and enterprises in Florida. We know how important your services are to your success. Therefore, we have a team of experts who will be delighted to manage your servers when you don’t have the headcount or the funding to hire additional workers. Our services are fairly priced, and we have many positive reviews and examples of the benefits our former clients have experienced from using our services.

Mission & Passion

A Decade Of Experience

We don’t just talk the talk. We have also walked the walk. Our professionals are well-trained, educated, and certified to perform IT-related services for anyone who needs them. We have been in the industry for 10 years and are confident that we’ll be around another 10 years after today.

Satisfaction Guaranteed

Our company offers a 100 percent guarantee. That means you can let us know if you are not happy with our services, and we will make an arrangement with you that may include refunding your expenses or revising the project. Every positive comment we receive from our clients confirms how well we perform and how flexible we are.

Dedicated Consultations

We operate as consultants along with our other services. Thus, you can reach out to us if you need a friendly and helpful person to assist you in choosing service options. Make a quick phone call to contact us & describe what you have on your list of goals. Our consultant will then perform an analysis & let you know if your plan seems feasible.

Testimonials

"We have been extremely satisfied with the services provided by ITKeepers. They have helped us to streamline our IT operations, reduce costs, and improve the reliability and security of our systems. The staff are knowledgeable and responsive, and have gone above and beyond to help us meet our business goals. We highly recommend ITKeepers to any organization looking for top-notch IT support and consulting services."

Danny Karam

"We have been extremely satisfied with the services provided by ITKeepers. They have helped us to streamline our IT operations, reduce costs, and improve the reliability and security of our systems. The staff are knowledgeable and responsive, and have gone above and beyond to help us meet our business goals. We highly recommend ITKeepers to any organization looking for top-notch IT support and consulting services."

Danny Karam

"We have been extremely satisfied with the services provided by ITKeepers. They have helped us to streamline our IT operations, reduce costs, and improve the reliability and security of our systems. The staff are knowledgeable and responsive, and have gone above and beyond to help us meet our business goals. We highly recommend ITKeepers to any organization looking for top-notch IT support and consulting services."

Danny Karam

"We have been extremely satisfied with the services provided by ITKeepers. They have helped us to streamline our IT operations, reduce costs, and improve the reliability and security of our systems. The staff are knowledgeable and responsive, and have gone above and beyond to help us meet our business goals. We highly recommend ITKeepers to any organization looking for top-notch IT support and consulting services."

Danny Karam

"We have been extremely satisfied with the services provided by ITKeepers. They have helped us to streamline our IT operations, reduce costs, and improve the reliability and security of our systems. The staff are knowledgeable and responsive, and have gone above and beyond to help us meet our business goals. We highly recommend ITKeepers to any organization looking for top-notch IT support and consulting services."

Danny Karam

Custom Projects May Be Available

Write a message informing us of how you need our services, and we’ll contact you to discuss your project more. Contact Now

Get In Touch

item.title: Landing page 04
item.dc:creator: info@itkeepers.com
item.content:encoded:
A leading provider of IT services in Florida.

Request a quote

Why Choose Us

We won’t obligate you to hire us for the project or tell you anything that interferes with achieving your goals. That’s why our customers love us, and you will feel the same after speaking to one of our people. Friendliness and kindness are two important elements to ensure that all parts of your IT projects go smoothly. Our customers are never an inconvenience. As such, we’re always eager and willing to respond to their service requests.

About Us

One of our greatest attributes is that we stay available to our clients 24 hours a day and seven days a week. Thus, we’ll never burden you by telling you only to contact us during certain hours. Our agents are available to speak to you about your IT needs when you have early-bird brainstorms, daytime questions, and nighttime epiphanies.

We want to help, and we understand that issues and concerns can arise at any time.

Expertise

Unlocking Technological Evolution for Your Business

In today's rapidly evolving digital landscape, technology stands ready to transform your business. Embrace this evolution by connecting with us for expert assistance in fostering the growth and seamless implementation of your IT systems. We offer various convenient methods for you to get in touch with us, ensuring a smoother journey toward technological excellence. Call Now

Services

Managed IT

IT Keepers specializes in providing managed IT in the state of Florida. Managed IT will allow you to have a dedicated team of professionals working on your computers and networks at all times.

Cloud Services

IT Keeper provides cloud services to people and businesses that need them. We are a well-trusted IT company in Florida, and cloud service is something many of our clients use and desire.

Security Solutions

IT Keeper can assist you with security solutions for your home computer, business network, or infrastructure. We can ensure that your machines have the highest level of protection.

Email Management

IT Keeper offers email management services to personal and business clients in various areas of Florida. Email is still one of the most vastly used methods of communication between businesses and their clients

Computer Networking

IT Keeper is a computer networking provider in Florida that can help you build and maintain a network. We helped business owners in various industries get their IT network off the ground with our services.

Server Management

IT Keeper offers server management to business entities and enterprises in Florida. We know how important your services are to your success. We've a team of experts who will be delighted to manage your servers.

Mission & Passion

A Decade Of Experience

We don’t just talk the talk. We have also walked the walk. Our professionals are well-trained, educated, and certified to perform IT-related services for anyone who needs them. We have been in the industry for 10 years and are confident that we’ll be around another 10 years after today.

Satisfaction Guaranteed

Our company offers a 100 percent guarantee. That means you can let us know if you are not happy with our services, and we will make an arrangement with you that may include refunding your expenses or revising the project. Every positive comment we receive from our clients confirms how well we perform and how flexible we are.

Dedicated Consultations

We operate as consultants along with our other services. Thus, you can reach out to us if you need a friendly and helpful person to assist you in choosing service options. Make a quick phone call to contact us & describe what you have on your list of goals. Our consultant will then perform an analysis & let you know if your plan seems feasible.

Testimonials

Danny Karam

"We have been extremely satisfied with the services provided by ITKeepers. They have helped us to streamline our IT operations, reduce costs, and improve the reliability and security of our systems. The staff are knowledgeable and responsive, and have gone above and beyond to help us meet our business goals. We highly recommend ITKeepers to any organization looking for top-notch IT support and consulting services."

Danny Karam

"We have been extremely satisfied with the services provided by ITKeepers. They have helped us to streamline our IT operations, reduce costs, and improve the reliability and security of our systems. The staff are knowledgeable and responsive, and have gone above and beyond to help us meet our business goals. We highly recommend ITKeepers to any organization looking for top-notch IT support and consulting services."

The staff are knowledgeable and responsive, and have gone above and beyond to help us meet our business goals. We highly recommend ITKeepers to any organization looking for top-notch IT support and consulting services."

The staff are knowledgeable and responsive, and have gone above and beyond to help us meet our business goals. We highly recommend ITKeepers to any organization looking for top-notch IT support and consulting services."

Danny Karam

"We have been extremely satisfied with the services provided by ITKeepers. They have helped us to streamline our IT operations, reduce costs, and improve the reliability and security of our systems. The staff are knowledgeable and responsive, and have gone above and beyond to help us meet our business goals. We highly recommend ITKeepers to any organization looking for top-notch IT support and consulting services."

Custom Projects May Be Available

Write a message informing us of how you need our services, and we’ll contact you to discuss your project more. Contact Now

Get In Touch

item.title: Landing page
item.dc:creator: info@itkeepers.com
item.content:encoded:
A leading provider of Top Notch IT services.

Unlock your 50% discount, and book your free Assessment.

Why Choose Us

With more than 10 years of experience, ITkeepers is your tech partner and consultant, Our mission is to guide your business to success; through innovative IT solutions.

About Us

One of our greatest attributes is that we stay available to our clients 24 hours a day and seven days a week. Thus, we’ll never burden you by telling you only to contact us during certain hours. Our agents are available to speak to you about your IT needs when you have early-bird brainstorms, daytime questions, and nighttime epiphanies.

We want to help, and we understand that issues and concerns can arise at any time.

Expertise

Revamp Your Infrastructure With A Last Chance 50% Discount

In today's rapidly evolving digital landscape, technology stands ready to transform your business. Embrace this evolution by connecting with us for expert assistance in fostering the growth and seamless implementation of your IT systems. We offer various convenient methods for you to get in touch with us, ensuring a smoother journey toward technological excellence. Call Now

Services

Comprehensive IT solutions including managed IT, cloud services, security solutions, email management, computer networking, and server management for your business needs.

Managed IT

IT Keepers specializes in providing managed IT in the state of Florida.

Cloud Services

IT Keeper provides cloud services to people and businesses that need them.

Security Solutions

IT Keeper can assist you with security solutions for your computer, business network, or infrastructure.

Email Management

IT Keeper offers email management services to personal and business clients in various areas of Florida.

Computer Networking

IT Keeper is a computer networking provider in Florida that can help you build and maintain a network.

Server Management

IT Keeper offers server management to business entities and enterprises in Florida.

Mission & Passion

A Decade Of Experience

We don’t just talk the talk. We have also walked the walk. Our professionals are well-trained, educated, and certified to perform IT-related services for anyone who needs them. We have been in the industry for 10 years and are confident that we’ll be around another 10 years after today.

Satisfaction Guaranteed

Our company offers a 100 percent guarantee. That means you can let us know if you are not happy with our services, and we will make an arrangement with you that may include refunding your expenses or revising the project. Every positive comment we receive from our clients confirms how well we perform and how flexible we are.

Dedicated Consultations

We operate as consultants along with our other services. Thus, you can reach out to us if you need a friendly and helpful person to assist you in choosing service options. Make a quick phone call to contact us & describe what you have on your list of goals. Our consultant will then perform an analysis & let you know if your plan seems feasible.

Testimonials

Danny Karam

"We have been extremely satisfied with the services provided by ITKeepers. They have helped us to streamline our IT operations.

Patricia Ramsaroop

Victor and his team are amazing. They take all my IT services off my back and are always available when i need them.

Jennifer Chahine

Fast service , amazing reception, friendly and professional! Keep it up guys ❤️

Perla Mouawad

Proactive and proffessional team of experts, I highly recommend ITkeepers!

Acct Now

Thank you, guys! The most reliable!

Last Chance Alert 50% Off, Secure Your Spot

Write a message informing us of how you need our services, and we’ll contact you to discuss your project more. Contact Now

Get In Touch

© Copyright 2023 All Right Reserved by Itkeepers

Follow us On

Instagram Facebook Linkedin
